Best Tig Welders for Aluminum – Top Picks & Reviews

June 9, 2021December 13, 2020 by Brayden
1.8k
SHARES
ShareTweet

If you ever wish to weld aluminum no matter for whatever reason, like weather for job purposes or for personal need, the only and best option to do so is through TIG welding process. This welding process provides precision and accuracy during aluminum welding which is ideal for it and never leaves any kind of spatters hence provides nice and clean welds.

However, learning it can be a tough job for few users but once done, there’s nothing like it in terms of welding.

Hence, without delaying further here are top of the line and the best tig welders for aluminum.

List of 7 Best Tig Welders for Aluminum

TIG welders are the best options for aluminum welding. They are more precise and give accurate and precised welding for a complex material like aluminium. They are just like holding pen and welding materials so in case of aluminum welding, precision is required.Check it out if you’re looking for budget Tig Welders.

All these best tig welders for aluminium are selected on the basis of tests and experiments and reviews carried out by genuine and practical users and these best aluminum tig welders have been selected on basis of their best performance and features that are top of the line and most suitable for the users in the current market. All the welding machines listed in this article are most advance and most trusted by the users.

Specifications:

It is top of the line tig welder for aluminum and steel. So it is ideal machine not only for welding aluminum but for steel as well.

Furthermore, this tig aluminum welder is equipped with IGBT technology to provide ultimate high voltage control to the user so that the user can get premium welds with full control over the machine.

It is extremely user-friendly tig welder for aluminum and other metals. The interface is clear with guide menu and with Alpha TIG200X, you are not going to have any issue regarding the movement and placement of the product as it is extremely light-weight and portable as well with only 23 pound total weight.

The controls are fully adjustable and the best thing about this tig welder for aluminum is that it offers PULSE functionality which in any machine means that it can automatically adjust itself according to the current fluctuations that ultimately increases the performance, stability, and overall life of any product.

Similarly, it also offers dual voltages, HF start, and another great thing with this aluminum tig welding machine is that food pedal is already included in the kit. So you don’t have to buy it separately.

So overall if we sum up, Alpha TIG200X is truly an amazing tig welder for aluminum and the best tig welder for aluminum and for all other metals of different thickness and sizes. It performs extremely well and to provide more comfort to the buyer, the company has already provided 3-years of warranty with the product so that user can buy it without any hurdle and with full trust.

The machine is overall superb and users who bought it before have hardly complained about it. It is absolutely, top rated tig welder for aluminum so you can go instantly with it and it will definitely, perform all the heavy duty as well as DIY tasks for you without any problem. Cheapest Aluminum Tig

Amico MTS-205

Specifications:

  • Duty Cycle: 60% @ 205 Amps, 100% @ 132 Amps
  • Dimensions: 18 x 9 x 14 inches
  • Weight: 27 pounds
  • Power source: AC
  • Input Voltage: 100/250 Volts
  • Amperage Range: 10-200 Amps
  • Warranty: 1-Year
Check On Amazon

Amico MTS-205 is the cheapest tig welder for aluminum in our list of best tig welders for aluminum and is extraordinary outstanding tig welding machine that a user can expect in such a cheap price.

It is most positively reviewed tig welder for aluminum in such a low price even and users have no complaints regarding this aluminum tig welder.

Besides this, this tig welder is capable of welding aluminum, alloy, mild steel, weld steel, stainless steel, copper, cast iron, and other materials of ½”. It offers dual functionalities like it can work as a TIG torch and also perform as STICK welder.

Furthermore, it utilized IGBT inverter technology that can overcome the fluctuations and automatically adjust the welds according to the volts and it also has short-circuited protection for its users to protect them from any kind of mishap.

It is extremely well reputed product from a well reputed brand and produces extremely nice and clean welds with almost no spatters and offers synergic controls and droplet transfer.

Another great point of this best tig welder for aluminum is that it utilizes high quality wire feeding to provide stable and smooth wire feed during aluminum welding which ideal for such kind of welds and also offers solenoid valve that automatically controls the gas and it is pre-installed in this tig weld.

Overall, this is truly an amazing and inexpensive tig welder for aluminum that gives automatic compensation for voltage fluctuation right away and also has over-voltage and under-voltage protection as well as over current and over load protection which is preinstalled in this tig welder.

Furthermore, automatic temperature control, fan dormancy, steeples amperage control are extra features of this best tig welder for aluminum.

So if you are going to buy this dual frequency stainless steel tig welder which is also ideal for aluminum then, you are going to see plenty of features that will be waiting for you right away in the box and this is truly a superb tig welder for aluminum that a beginner or light professional user can have as a small and compact tig welding machine for different welding tasks.

The volts and amperage range, as well as duty cycles of this tig welder are covered in specs area but overall, this tig welder is best for beginners who are just trying to learn tig welder and in small budget then this machine is best for them and for daily purpose use.

The Weldpro 200 is most flexible aluminum tig welder that provide wide rang eof options to the user in low price which include TIG/Stick welding, MIG and Flux core welding although the aluminum welding can be achieved on MIG so TIG process is not used for aluminum welding. So if you want to have a tig welder for aluminum then our best recommendations are Primeweld in such a price range.

FAQ’s

There are many tig welders available in the market that can weld aluminum and considered as top of the line tig welders for aluminum. Generally high-end devices provide more options but if you are a normal user and like a professional machine that can weld low and heavy duty aluminum welds at the same time and is low in price as well then, Primeweld is best option that is positively reviewed by each single of its user and provide extremely premium aluminum welds in low price.

If you are working on a thin metal then, Tig welder will be the best option as it provide more precision and control to the welding whereas, MIG welding can generally weld all kind of metals, even aluminum but will not produce those results that TIG can provide. With TIG welding you can weld on all kind of metals but it is generally best for aluminum welding.

DC mode is mostly used for TIG welding during metals other than aluminum because it can penetrate more deeply that AC mode. During aluminum welding, AC (alternating current) is used as it switches the polarity between standard mode and reverse downs instantly from 60 to 120 times every second.

TIG welding is the basic method used to weld aluminum. Any TIG welder can weld aluminum, but there are many factors that can impact the aluminum welding. It completely depends upon the user to weld aluminum with that precise quality that is required for aluminum. As far as current is concerned? Yes, all tig welders can weld aluminum.

Conclusion

There are many tig welders for alumnum available in the market but the preference completely depends upon personal use, need, and budget. So we have selected best ones in our list but still according to our preference and needs, Primeweld is most suitable option as it is cheap yet most powerful tig welder for aluminum that meets all the welding needs and requirement. Although, every mentioned welder is the best tig welder for aluminum so read thoroughly through each option to make a better decision.
